item.title: SANS SEC 552 Cheatsheet
item.description: App Analysis, Logic, and SQL Attacks ðŸ’¡ Course is inspired from case studies found in various bug bounty programs related to web and mobile app attacks. It will help in catching and reporting tricky web and mobile app security bugs that are commonly reported in bug bounty programs. The Hunterâ€™s Challenge JOINING A PROGRAM ðŸ’¡ Security researchers can choose from many bug bounty programs available, either from the vendor directly or through a bug bounty platform (HackerOne, Bugcrowd, Synack…)
